Bajaj Chetak.text: I made a mistake by purchasing chetak 3502, it's battery became dead in just 2 months and it's been more than 10 days, I am without any 2 wheeler. People told me to go for Rizta or Icube but I had a blind faith in chetak, which shattered, only after purchasing 3502. Now I'll suggest not to waste your money by buying any chetak.
Bajaj Chetak.author: @wandererbothra6247

Bajaj Chetak.text: Don‚Äôt buy Chetak. I bought 7 months back and since then continuous issues on off switch stopped working, front wheel jammed while driving I fell down, range all of a sudden came down to 40-45km. Extremely poor service in city like Delhi. Service centre and company don‚Äôt even reply to mails or any communication.

Bajaj Chetak.text:
Sudden range drop in my bajaj chetak ev
I bought a Bajaj Chetak 1 year ago , the battery range dropped normally‚Äîjust 2 to 3 km over a short distance. But after riding for a few more minutes, the range suddenly dropped by 20 km, going from 68 km to 48 km. I‚Äôve only traveled a maximum of 3 to 4 km, so this sudden drop really scared. showroom all r bogus service center in amravati
